summary: This is Mofomojo\'s Aspect of the Beast. Do you want to try out being a beast without actually being a Werewolf? This will give you a concoction to \"Cook up\" at a cooking pot which will grant you a potion of \"Aspect of the Beast\". Simpyl down the potion and VOILA, you\'ll turn into wolf form for a time and get to try it out.
descriptionHtml:
==============
Aspect of the Beast
By: MofoMojo
==============

==============
Description
==============
This is Mofomojo\'s Aspect of the Beast. Do you want to try out being a beast without actually being a Werewolf? This will give you a 

concoction to \"Cook up\" at a cooking pot which will grant you a potion of \"Aspect of the Beast\". Simpyl down the potion and VOILA, 

you\'ll turn into wolf form for a time and get to try it out. 

Ingredients required:
Wolf Pelt
Bear Claws
Garlic

==============
Features
==============
Create potions at a cooking pot to give you \"Beast Form\" 

================
Current Version Changes
================
1.0 
Initial Release
================
HOW TO INSTALL
================

--------------
==Plugin==
--------------
-Open the Skyrim launcher
-Click on data files
-Check \"MM_AspectOfTheBeastPotion\"

---------
==In Game==
---------
You can craft this at a cooking pot with a Wolf Pelt, Bear Claws, and Garlic
author: MofoMojo
